 OOC: BlackFortress hasn't tunnels that let the bots come in to the base, not  by now. The base is inside a lava pool and thanks a complicate mechanism the lava can up and down. But not exist tunnels that connect the fortress with the ground
  CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote: Lunarpine finally fealt that things were going his way. He aproached the
lava pool where the Black fortress's tunnel was, there were Predacon scents
gathered here so Lunarpine thought "This must be the place."

He continued to scan the comm line to make sure that no other transmissions
were going out. He listened carefully to the conversation going on between
Azure Blade and Shivah. He knew that there could be trouble if they tried to
reprogram his group. The worst part was that reprogramming a Maximal would
be a serious offense to the non agression pact the two groups had.
